sentences.sContent: measures to accelerate the rate of economic growth
sentences.sCn: 加快经济增长速度的措施

sentences.sContent: ...Although many researchers broadly agree that public access to raw data would accelerate science...
...The pending bills would spend additional money to accelerate this effort...
...Efforts to accelerate the current energy transitions didn't succeed as expected...
...the process of urbanization will only accelerate in the decades to come — with an enormous impact on biodiversity and potentially on climate change...

remMethod.val: ac(表加强) ＋ celer(速度) ＋ ate(使…) → 使增速

words.tran: 促进的，[物] 加速的；催化的
加速，促进；[物] 加速度
油门；催化剂；[机] 加速装置

trans.tranOther: if a process accelerates or if something accelerates it, it happens faster than usual or sooner than you expect
